channel.title: CVE Feed for Weston Embedded -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Weston Embedded -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-46378|2024-08-03T14:31:46.327Z -- weston%20embedded -- uc-ftps
item.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in the PORT command parameter extraction functionality of Weston Embedded uC-FTPs v 1.98.00. A specially-crafted set of network packets can lead to denial of service. An attacker can send packets to trigger this vulnerability.This vulnerability occurs when no port argument is provided to the `PORT` command.

item.title: CVE-2022-41985|2024-08-03T12:56:39.171Z -- weston%20embedded -- uc-ftps
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability exists in the Authentication functionality of Weston Embedded uC-FTPs v 1.98.00. A specially crafted set of network packets can lead to authentication bypass and denial of service. An attacker can send a sequence of unauthenticated packets to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-46377|2024-08-03T14:31:46.335Z -- weston%20embedded -- uc-ftps
item.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in the PORT command parameter extraction functionality of Weston Embedded uC-FTPs v 1.98.00. A specially-crafted set of network packets can lead to denial of service. An attacker can send packets to trigger this vulnerability.This vulnerability occurs when no IP address argument is provided to the `PORT` command.

item.title: CVE-2023-45318|2024-08-02T20:21:15.925Z -- weston%20embedded -- uc-http
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the HTTP Server functionality of Weston Embedded uC-HTTP git commit 80d4004. A specially crafted network packet can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-39541|2024-08-02T18:10:21.401Z -- weston%20embedded -- uc-tcp-ip
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the ICMP and ICMPv6 parsing functionality of Weston Embedded uC-TCP-IP v3.06.01. A specially crafted network packet can lead to an out-of-bounds read. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.This vulnerability concerns a denial of service within the parsing an IPv6 ICMPv6 packet.

item.title: CVE-2023-39540|2024-08-02T18:10:21.370Z -- weston%20embedded -- uc-tcp-ip
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the ICMP and ICMPv6 parsing functionality of Weston Embedded uC-TCP-IP v3.06.01. A specially crafted network packet can lead to an out-of-bounds read. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.This vulnerability concerns a denial of service within the parsing an IPv4 ICMP packet.

item.title: CVE-2023-45318|2024-07-29T15:07:16.424Z -- weston%20embedded -- uc-http
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the HTTP Server functionality of Weston Embedded uC-HTTP git commit 80d4004. A specially crafted network packet can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-38562|2024-02-20T18:00:11.491Z -- weston%20embedded -- uc-tcp-ip
item.description: A double-free vulnerability exists in the IP header loopback parsing functionality of Weston Embedded uC-TCP-IP v3.06.01. A specially crafted set of network packets can lead to memory corruption, potentially resulting in code execution. An attacker can send a sequence of unauthenticated packets to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-39540|2024-02-20T18:00:11.007Z -- weston%20embedded -- uc-tcp-ip
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the ICMP and ICMPv6 parsing functionality of Weston Embedded uC-TCP-IP v3.06.01. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.This vulnerability concerns a denial of service within the parsing an IPv4 ICMP packet.

item.title: CVE-2023-38562|2024-08-02T17:46:55.845Z -- weston%20embedded -- uc-tcp-ip
item.description: A double-free vulnerability exists in the IP header loopback parsing functionality of Weston Embedded uC-TCP-IP v3.06.01. A specially crafted set of network packets can lead to memory corruption, potentially resulting in code execution. An attacker can send a sequence of unauthenticated packets to trigger this vulnerability.
